data.meta_description: Mar 17, 2013 - Ricardo Bofill born in Barcelona, Spain. 1939. He studied at the School of Architecture in Geneva, Switzerland. In 1963, he founded a group formed by architects, engineers, sociologists and philosophers, creating the basis for what today is the ‘Taller de Arquitectura’, an international team with over 40 years experience in urban design, architecture, parks and gardens designs, and interior design. See more ideas about ricardo bofill, architecture, architect.
